content: top-down raglan-style pullover with mock turtleneck and decorative increase and decrease pattern on waistline and sleeves **garment dimensions** sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl chest sizes 82 90 98 106 116 126 136 146 cm garment chest circumference 89 96 102 110 123 131 144 153 cm sleeve circumference 27 30 33 36 39 42 45 48 cm sleeve length 42 43 43 44 44 45 45 45 cm full length incl neckband 57 58 59 60 61 63 65 67 cm **requirements** - 250 250 300 300 350 400 450 500 g pernilla pattern uses color 366 sugar almond - 125 125 150 150 175 200 225 250 g alva pattern uses color 366 sugar almond - 3 5 and 4 5mm circular needles with an 80cm cable - 3 5 and 4 5mm double-pointed needles if not using magic loop - 6 stitch markers - 2 stitch holders - waste yarn for italian cast on pattern is knit using both yarns held together
